issue.title: Can't Set Joint State When Using Simbody

content.raw:
I believe `Joint::SetVelocity` is working, since it is used in the [INTEGRATION_joint_spawn test](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/07fcf3c9672cec69ce225ea29f8f1cda9f99bbe6/test/integration/joint_spawn.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#joint_spawn.cc-307), but there seem to be problems with setting joint position, since the [INTEGRATION_joint_set_position test](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/07fcf3c9672cec69ce225ea29f8f1cda9f99bbe6/test/integration/joint_set_position_test.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#joint_set_position_test.cc-73) is disabled.

I think the `Joint::SetPosition` functions should be similar to `Joint::SetVelocity`.
content.html:
I believe Joint::SetVelocity is working, since it is used in the INTEGRATION_joint_spawn test, but there seem to be problems with setting joint position, since the INTEGRATION_joint_set_position test is disabled.

I think the Joint::SetPosition functions should be similar to Joint::SetVelocity.
